question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and child while you go out drinking.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Give contact details for when you are away.Give instructions on how to take care of your child.Describe other household duties.
text: I hope this letter finds you well. As discussed yesterday's  call I am going out for a sleepover party tonight and I would like to give my contact information along with the emergency number as well .      I am sure that I will answer your call immediately despite the noise and party mood at my friend's house.

As you know, my kid is always hilarious and makes others feel happy. Hence, you just need to spend time with him including playing some board games. In addition, you may feel mesmerized by looking at his toys, therefore he just needs help to put them in order to play with them. Last but not the least, please do not switch off the lights as he may be terrified due to darkness.

I know , you may be tired with your office work, however, I would request you to help my kid to do a bath and also do not forget to keep his night dress in the bathroom. I would appreciate it if you could take care of my gardening work along with my pet too.
I look forward to seeing you at my place before 6pm today as I need to be there at 7pm.
